name: Xchat
description: XChat is a cross-platform IRC communication protocol software. It has a good user interface with common chat features, you can log in any IRC server to communicate with others by it.

en_US.description: XChat is a cross-platform IRC communication protocol software. It has a good user interface with common chat features, you can log in any IRC server to communicate with others by it.
en_US.name: Xchat

zh_CN.description: Xchat是一款跨平台的IRC通讯协议软件，有着良好的用户界面，具备常用的聊天功能，利用它您可以登录到任何的IRC服务器与别人交流。
zh_CN.name: Xchat
